sentences.en: An artist sculpted a full-size replica of her head.
sentences.cn: 一位艺术家雕塑了一尊她头部的全幅头像。

sentences.en: An orchestrated series of courts divide and sculpt the space of the house.
sentences.cn: 精心策划的一系列庭院将整个公馆的空间分隔.

sentences.en: Centering around sculpt, these integrated factors interact and affect each other.
sentences.cn: 这些综合因素围绕造型这个中心相互作用,相互影响.

sentences.en: Chinese painters are famous for their smart drawing, simple sculpt and human spirit.
sentences.cn: 辉煌七百多年,中国文人写意画以其潇洒的笔法 、 简括的造型、豁达的人文精神著称于世.

sentences.en: Modern sculpt of streamline perform the art of kitchen cabinet perfectly.
sentences.cn: 前卫的流线造型,如行云流水般演绎厨房家居艺术.

sentences.en: Position your fingers horizontally and sculpt parallel with the shears.
sentences.cn: 水平地放置你的手指而且用修剪雕刻平行.

sentences.en: Position your fingers horizontally and sculpt parallel.
sentences.cn: 水平地放置你的手指而且雕刻平行.

sentences.en: Position your fingers parallel and sculpt.
sentences.cn: 放置你的手指平行而且雕刻.

sentences.en: Position your fingers parallel to the parting and sculpt.
sentences.cn: 放置对分别的你手指平行而且雕刻.

sentences.en: Project the top parting at 90 degrees, use the shorter length guide and sculpt parallel.
sentences.cn: 以90度计画顶端分开, 使用较短长度引导者而且雕刻平行.

sentences.en: The dashed lines indicate the partings that will be used to sculpt each section.
sentences.cn: 被猛掷的线指出分别以将会用来雕刻每个区段.

sentences.en: The original structure, sculpt and configuration of fresh flower can be reserved.
sentences.cn: 它能够保持鲜花原来的结构 、 造型和形态,可供长期欣赏.

sentences.en: Then, sculpt the remaining fringe parting.
sentences.cn: 然后, 雕刻剩余的边缘分别.

sentences.en: Trigonal tongue cover, generous sculpt, easy to open.
sentences.cn: 三角形舌盖, 造型大方,方便开启.

sentences.en: When I sculpt, my style is expressionistic.
sentences.cn: 我的雕刻风格是表现主义。

words.tran_cn: 用刻纹装饰的；具刻纹的
雕刻；用雕塑装饰（sculpture的过去式）

trans.tran_en: to make a particular shape from stone, wood, clay etc
to make a particular shape from stone, wood, clay etc
